meanings.definition: Relating to or involving both the eyes and movement.
meanings.sent1: The optokinetic test measured how well my eyes could track moving objects.
meanings.sent2: The optokinetic reflex helps us keep our eyes on a moving target.
meanings.sent3: I tried an optokinetic illusion where my eyes followed a spinning wheel.
meanings.sent4: Her optokinetic vision was like a camera smoothly tracking a subject in motion.
meanings.sent5: The optokinetic sensation made it feel like my eyes were dancing with the moving scenery.

meanings.definition: A type of visual stimulus that involves movement to elicit a response.
meanings.sent1: The optokinetic stimulus on the screen made me feel like I was moving.
meanings.sent2: The optokinetic pattern on the wall captivated the baby's attention.
meanings.sent3: The optokinetic display at the museum was like a moving painting.
meanings.sent4: Her optokinetic response to the video was immediate and noticeable.
meanings.sent5: The optokinetic effect of the animation created a sense of motion in the still image.
